name: GetProductDetailsById
description:
Retrieve product details using a product ID.

This tool retrieves the details of a product in HubSpot CRM using its product ID. It can also use any unique property specified by the `idProperty` query parameter. Use this tool to obtain specific product information from HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product. Can be the internal ID or any unique property as specified by `idProperty`.

parameters.name: properties_to_return
parameters.description: A list of product properties to include in the response. Any missing properties will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: properties_with_history
parameters.description: List properties to return with their history of past values, separated by commas. Ignored if not present in object.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: retrieve_associated_object_ids
parameters.description: A list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. Any non-existent associations will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: Specify the property name with unique values for the product object, instead of default productId.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

parameters.name: return_archived_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived results. If false, only non-archived results are returned.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
